# msatwRangler

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of msatwRangler is to make MicroMerge software available to people that son't know what software Mendel is.

## Installation

You can install msatwRangler with this line of code:

``` {r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("andreasbennetsenboe/msatwRangler")
```
